text: Jilani: “Ana mu akwawanganya wenu (ni Allah) pana jwaakongolelaga ku yakuona?” Jilani: “Allah ni jwaakongolelaga ku yakuona. Ana jwaakongolela ku yakuona ngawa nijwali jwakuwajilwa kunkuya, kapena ajula jwangawa nkulipatila chongoko niikaweje akajongoledwe? Ana chipali chichi kukwenu? Nkulamula chinauli?”
